metadata.title: CVE-2023-52692 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ALSA:scarlett2: Add missing error check to scarlett2_usb_set_config()scarlett2_usb_set_config() calls scarlett2_usb_get() but was not checkingthe result. Return the error if it fails rather than continuing with aninvalid value.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
